scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs && docker run -v $(pwd)/docs:/usr/share/nginx/html -it --rm -p 8080:80 nginx:1.27.0
scripts.docker:build: docker build --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t ws_client .
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -it --name ws_client ws_client
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker build --no-cache --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t ws_client .
scripts.docker:build:chainguard: docker build --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile.chainguard --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t ws_client_chainguard .
scripts.docker:run:chainguard: npm run docker:build:chainguard && docker run --rm -it --name ws_client_chainguard ws_client_chainguard
scripts.docker:rebuild:chainguard: docker build --no-cache --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile.chainguard --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t ws_client_chainguard .
